paper.title: Fuzzy ranking of financial statements for fraud detection
paper.abstract: Automatic detection of anomalies in financial statements can decrease the risk of exposure to fraudulent corporate behavior. This paper proposes a method to convert fraud classification rules learned from a genetic algorithm to a fuzzy score representing the degree to which a company's financial statements match those rules. Applying the method to financial data in real time can lead to the early detection of potentially fraudulent corporate behavior.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种通过模糊评分检测财务报表欺诈的方法，旨在降低企业欺诈行为的风险，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
